name: KOTA DORIA SAREE ( KT25417 )
description: This exquisite Kota Doria Saree features traditional Bagru block prints, renowned for their intricate designs and vibrant colors. Made from pure cotton, it offers a lightweight and comfortable drape, perfect for various occasions. The delicate fabric and handcrafted details reflect the rich artistry of Rajasthan.
careInstructions: Dry clean only for first wash. Subsequent washes can be gentle hand wash in cold water with mild detergent. Do not bleach. Dry in shade.
